page1.title: Siyakwamukela eqhweni
page1.description: [[:ice]] wuhlobo lwemali lwedijithali ongaluzuza ngocingo lwakho. Iqhwa liphethwe futhi lisetshenziswa abasebenzisi bansuku zonke njengawe.

page2.title: iplanethi enobungane
page2.description: [[:ice]] iyonga amandla ngokwemvelo kune-BTC njengoba isebenzisa "Ubufakazi Besiteki" indlela yokuvumelana. Ngobufakazi besiteki (i-POS), abanikazi be-cryptocurrency baqinisekisa ukuthengiswa kwebhulokhi ngokusekelwe enanini lezinhlamvu zemali zesiteki sokuqinisekisa.

page3.title: Imali Yabantu
page3.description_part2: Yonke into esithuthukisa kuyo[[:ice]] izoba umthombo ovulekile futhi ilawulwe yi-Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO).

page4.title: Hlala Uxhumekile
page4.description: Thepha[[:iceLogo]] ukuze ungene kwakho kwansuku zonke ngohlelo lwethu lokusebenza leselula lamahhala, elilula. Ukuthepha kwakho kwansuku zonke kuqinisekisa ukuthi iqhwa liphelela ezandleni zabantu bangempela, hhayi ama-bot.

page5.title: Bheka futhi Uzuze
page5.description: Mema abangani bakho futhi uzuze (nobabili) ibhonasi efika ku-25% ngesilinganiso sakho esiyisisekelo somholo womngane ngamunye ojoyina iqembu lakho.

page6.title: Izaziso
page6.description_part1: [[:ice]] izikhathi zokungena zithatha amahora angama-24 kuphela. Ungathanda ukuthola isaziso uma isikhathi sakho samanje siphela?

empty.title: Okwamanje awunakho[[:title]] ukudluliselwa!
empty.contacts: Okwamanje awunabo oxhumana nabo ebhukwini lefoni.

contacts.empty_description: Vumelanisa abathintwayo bakho futhi ubone ukuthi ubani osevele evuliwe[[:ice]]. Ngokuzayo, uzokwazi ukuthumela iqhwa kunoma yibaphi oxhumana nabo.

confirm_code.title: Qinisekisa Ikhodi
confirm_code.description: Sicela ufake ikhodi yokuqinisekisa oyithole ocingweni lwakho.

confirm_phone.title: Qinisekisa Ifoni
confirm_phone.description: Sicela uqinisekise ikhodi yakho yezwe bese ufaka inombolo yakho yocingo.

contacts_list.invitation_text: Sawubona{{name}}, ngithanda ukukumema ukuthi ujoyine i-ice.

signIn.privacy: Ngokuqhubeka, uyavumelana[[:link]] neMigomo yethu Yesevisi[[/:link]] kanye[[:link]] Nenqubomgomo Yobumfihlo[[/:link]]

claimUsername.title: Funa isidlaliso
claimUsername.description: Abangani bakho bazodinga ukusebenzisa lesi siteketiso ukuze bajoyine iqembu lakho.
claimUsername.note_part1: Lapho udala isiteketiso, sebenzisa kuphela izinhlamvu, izinombolo, nezikhathi.

whoInvitedYou.title: Ubani okumemile?
whoInvitedYou.dontHaveInvitationCode: Ngokuqedela lesi sinyathelo, wena nomngane wakho nizothola ibhonasi engu-25% ngenani eliyisisekelo lomholo lapho nobabili ningena ngesikhathi esisodwa.
whoInvitedYou.dontHaveCodeTip: Uma ungenayo ikhodi yesimemo sizokhetha ilungu elingahleliwe njengokudlulisela kwakho!

errors.multiple_accounts: I-imeyili/inombolo yocingo ihlotshaniswa nenye i-akhawunti. Sicela ungene kuleyo akhawunti ukuze uqinisekise ubunikazi, bese uphuma futhi ungene kulena. Uma ungeyena umnikazi waleyo akhawunti enye noma ungakwazi ukungena kuyo, sicela uthinte abosekelo bethu.
errors.wrong_phone_number: Inombolo yocingo engavumelekile, sicela uzame futhi.
errors.invalid_validation_code: Inombolo yocingo engavumelekile, sicela uzame futhi.
errors.account_exists_with_different_credential: Isivele ikhona i-akhawunti enekheli le-imeyili eligonyelwa ubufakazo.
errors.operation_not_allowed: Uhlobo lwe-akhawunti oluhambisana nemininingwane alunikiwe amandla.
errors.google_play_services_not_available: Amasevisi e-Google Play awatholakali kule divayisi.
errors.code_expired: Ikhodi iphelelwe yisikhathi, sicela ucele ikhodi entsha.
errors.too_many_requests: Izicelo eziningi kakhulu, sicela uzame futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
errors.network_error_message: Idivayisi yakho ayinalo uxhumano lwe-inthanethi olusebenzayo.
errors.unknown_error: Kwenzeke iphutha, sicela uzame futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
errors.general_error_message: Kubukeka sengathi kukhona okungahambanga kahle. Ithimba lethu lisebenzela ukuyilungisa njengamanje.
errors.general_network_error: Kwenzeke iphutha lenethiwekhi, sicela uhlole ukuxhumana kwakho.
errors.credential_already_in_use: Lezi mininingwane sezivele zihlotshaniswa ne-akhawunti yomsebenzisi ehlukile.
errors.email_already_in_use: Ikheli le-imeyili selivele lisetshenziswa enye i-akhawunti.
errors.user_token_expired: Imininingwane yakho ayisavumelekile, sicela ungene ngemvume futhi.
errors.requires_recent_login: Lo msebenzi uyazwela futhi udinga ukuqinisekiswa kwakamuva. Sicela ungene ngemvume futhi.

profile.invite_friends_engage: Sabalalisa izwi futhi umeme abangani bakho. Uma udluliswa okwengeziwe, uzozuza kakhulu!

pioneer.description: Bheka abasebenzisi abaningi futhi uzuze okwengeziwe[[:ice]].

tasks.title: Intuthuko yakho
tasks.description: Qedela imisebenzi engezansi bese ukhuphuka ileveli!

completed.title: Siyakuhalalisela
completed.description: Qhubeka uhlola nsuku zonke ukuze uthole imiklomelo eyengeziwe!

popup.title: Joyina isiteshi sethu seTelegram
popup.description: Cacisa igama lakho lesiteketiso elisetshenziswa kuTelegram.

claim_username.title: Funa isidlaliso
claim_username.description: Isethe futhi wabelane ngayo nabangani bakho.

join_telegram.title: Joyina iTelegram
join_telegram.description: Yiba yingxenye yomphakathi wethu futhi ujoyine manje.

invite_friends.title: Mema Abangane
invite_friends.description: Khulisa iqembu lakho futhi ukhuphule umholo wakho.

engagement.title: UKUBAMBISANA
engagement.description_part1: I-Streak isho ukuthi zingaki izinsuku ezilandelanayo ongenile.
engagement.description_part2: Ezinsukwini eziyisi-6 ezilandelanayo uthola usuku olulodwa lokuphumula.

settings.title: Izilungiselelo
settings.push_notifications_description: Yenza ngokwezifiso izilungiselelo zakho zesaziso sohlelo lokusebenza.
settings.email_notifications_description: Enza ngendlela oyifisayo izilungiselelo zesaziso sakho se-imeyili.

confirm_phone.title: Qinisekisa Ifoni
confirm_phone.description: Sicela uqinisekise ikhodi yakho yezwe bese ufaka inombolo yakho yocingo.

notifications.enable_prompt: Izaziso azivunyelwe. Ingabe ufuna ukuwanika amandla?
notifications.disable_notifications_description: Ngokukhubaza izaziso ngeke ukwazi ukuthola izibuyekezo uma usungaqala ukungena, izindaba noma ulwazi lweqembu.

promotions.title: Amaphromoshini
promotions.description: Thola izaziso zokuthi ungalikhulisa kanjani iqembu lakho futhi uzuze okwengeziwe.

daily_bonus.title: Ibhonasi yansuku zonke
daily_bonus.description: Thola izaziso zokufuna ibhonasi yakho yansuku zonke.

system.title: Uhlelo
system.description: Thola izaziso ezibalulekile mayelana nohlelo lokusebenza lweqhwa.

change_lang_confirm.title: Shintsha ulimi
change_lang_confirm.prompt: Ukusebenzisa lesi silungiselelo kuzoqala kabusha uhlelo lokusebenza.

settings.update_email_confirmation_subtitle: Ukushintsha ikheli lakho le-imeyili kuzodinga ukuthi uphinde ungene ngemvume. Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukuqhubeka?

invite_share.title: Mema Abangane
invite_share.share_message: Sawubona ☃️ Indoda yeqhwa! Joyina iqembu lami eqhweni futhi uthole izinhlamvu zemali zeqhwa eziyi-10 lapho ubhalisa usebenzisa ikhodi yami yokudlulisela:
invite_share.description: Sabalalisa izwi futhi umeme abangani bakho. Uzuza[[:ice]] ngokudluliselwa ngakunye okusha ofika nakho.

staking.benefits_description: Beka kusengaphambili imiklomelo yakho yeqhwa kuze kube yiminyaka engu-5 futhi ukhuphule izinga lakho lemali oyitholayo kufika ku-250%.
staking.title: I-Pre-Staking
staking.description: I-Staking yinqubo ehlanganisa ukwenza izimpahla zakho ze-crypto zisekele inethiwekhi ye-blockchain futhi uqinisekise ukuthengiselana.
staking.terms_agree: Ngiyavumelana neMigomo[[:ice]] [[:link]] Ye-Staking[[/:link]]. Iqhwa lakho lizokhiywa isikhathi esikhethiwe.
staking.confirm_subtitle: Ingabe uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukubeka kuqala izinhlamvu zemali zakho? Lokhu akukwazi ukuhlehliswa uma usuqinisekisile.

update_required.title: Sicela Ubuyekeze
update_required.description: Usebenzisa inguqulo yohlelo lokusebenza endala futhi udinga ukuyibuyekeza ukuze uyisebenzisele ukuqhubeka.

search.empty: Sesha abathintwayo, abangani beqhwa namalungu omphakathi wakho omncane.

tabbar.mining_reset_tooltip: Cindezela isekhondi elingu-1 ukuze unwebe isikhathi sakho sokungena.
tabbar.mining_holiday_reset_tooltip: Usebenzisa i-Day Off! Cindezela isekhondi elingu-1 ukuze unwebe isikhathi sakho sokungena.

pop_up.update_now_text: Usebenzisa inguqulo yohlelo lokusebenza endala futhi udinga ukuyibuyekeza ukuze uyisebenzisele ukuqhubeka.
pop_up.up_to_date_text: Manje usebenzisa inguqulo yakamuva. Hlola zonke izinguquko ngezansi.
pop_up.resurrection_message: Unethuba elilodwa lokuvuka futhi wamukele[[:amount]] izinhlamvu zemali ozilahlekele esikhathini esidlule[[:period]] .
pop_up.resurrection_no_confirm_message: Uzolahlekelwa[[:amount]] izinhlamvu zemali zakho unomphela. Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukuqhubeka?
pop_up.resurrection_yes_confirm_message: Ungavusa kanye kuphela! Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukuqhubeka? Izinhlamvu[[:amount]] zemali zizobuyela kubhalansi yakho phakathi nehora elilandelayo.
pop_up.delete_account_confirmation_text: Ukususa i-akhawunti yakho kuzosula unaphakade yonke idatha yakho, okuhlanganisa nebhalansi yakho yeqhwa. Uyafuna ukuqhubeka?

notifications.add_both: Engeza izaziso ezenziwe inhlekisa nezimemezelo ndawonye
notifications.title: Izaziso

step1.title: 1. Izibalo Zephrofayela Yakho
step1.description: Thepha emabhuloki ofuna ukuwafihla emehlweni omphakathi.

step2.description: Thepha le block ukuze uyifihle emehlweni omphakathi.
step2.title: 2. Indima Yakho Yamanje

step3.title: 3. Amabheji Akho Owatholile
step3.description: Thepha lapha ukuze ufihle amabheji akho emehlweni omphakathi.

confirm_email.title: Qinisela i-Imeyili?
confirm_email.description: Sicela ufake ikheli lakho le-imeyili futhi sizokuthumela ikhodi.
confirm_email.note: Uma ungazange uyithole i-imeyili phakathi nemizuzu engu-5, sicela uhlole ifolda yakho yogaxekile.
confirm_email.link_instruction: Chofoza isixhumanisi ukuze ungene ngemvume noma ubhalise.
confirm_email.reset_link_instruction: Chofoza isixhumanisi ukuze usethe kabusha iphasiwedi yakho.
confirm_email.modify_description: Sicela ufake ikheli lakho le-imeyili elisha.

invalid_link.title: Isixhumanisi esingavumelekile
invalid_link.description: Ngeshwa, lesi sixhumanisi asivumelekile, sicela ufake i-imeyili yakho futhi sizokuthumelela isixhumanisi esisha.

ice_bonus.title: Wamukelekile umvuzo
ice_bonus.description: Siyakuhalalisela, uthole izinhlamvu zemali zakho zokuqala[[:value]] [[:ice]] ezifakazela[[:bold]] Ukuthembela[[/:bold]] kwethu[[:bold]] Kuwe[[/:bold]].

snowman.title: I-snowman
snowman.subtitle: Yakha umbuso weqhwa
snowman.description: Zuza ngokuhlola njalo emahoreni angama-24 ukuze ubonise ukuzibophezela kwakho kunethiwekhi yeqhwa futhi ufakazele ukuthi ungumuntu, hhayi irobhothi.

ambassador.title: Inxusa
ambassador.subtitle: Umbusi wombuso weqhwa
ambassador.description: Uba yinxusa lapho okungenani abantu abayi-100 bejoyina iqembu lakho. Wonke amanxusa azothola ukufinyelela kwangaphambi kwesikhathi kuzici ezintsha.

confirm_phone.modify_description: Sicela uqinisekise ikhodi yakho yezwe bese ufaka inombolo yakho yocingo.

readmore.title: Funda kabanzi
readmore.description: Lapha ungabona izindaba zethu zakamuva ezivela ethimbeni lethu. Thepha le nkinobho ukuze ufunde isihloko esigcwele.

releasednews.title: Izindaba ezikhishiwe
releasednews.description: Thepha esihlokweni ngasinye sezindaba futhi ufunde inguqulo yaso egcwele. Hlala unolwazi lwakamuva ngazo zonke izindaba zethu nezinhlolovo.

allow_contacts.title: Bonke abathintwayo
allow_contacts.description: Vumelanisa abathintwayo bakho futhi ubone ukuthi ubani osevele evuliwe[[:ice]]. Ngokuzayo, uzokwazi ukuthumela iqhwa kunoma yibaphi oxhumana nabo.[[:ice]]

confirm_phone.title: Qinisekisa Ifoni
confirm_phone.description: Qinisekisa ubuwena futhi uvumele oxhumana nabo bazi ukuthi nawe uyilungu lenethiwekhi yeqhwa. Inombolo yakho yocingo ngeke kwabelwane ngayo nabanye abantu besithathu.

contacts_list.title: Uhlu loxhumana nabo
contacts_list.description: Lolu uhlu olunabo bonke othintana nabo, labo asebevele bajoyine[[:ice]] inethiwekhi ababoniswa phezu kohlu.

referrals.title: Ukudluliselwa
referrals.description: Lapha uzobona ukuthi bangaki ama-referrals onawo sebebonke. Uma ubamema abantu abaningi, uzozuza kakhulu.

earnings.title: Amaholo
earnings.description: Ibhalansi yakho yamanje ibuyekezwa njalo ngehora futhi iboniswe lapha. Kuhlanganisa izinzuzo zakho eziqondile nezigxilile kanye nemali etholwayo yesigaba 1 kanye nesigaba 2.

segmented_control_tier_one.title: Isigaba 1
segmented_control_tier_one.description: Lapha ungabona uhlu lokudluliselwa kwakho yesigaba 1. Kumngane ngamunye ongena ngesikhathi esifanayo nawe, uzothola u-25% owengeziwe kusilinganiso sakho samanje sokutholwa kokutholwa. [[:link]]Funda kabanzi[[/:link]]

segmented_control_tier_two.title: Isigaba 2
segmented_control_tier_two.description: Lapha ungabona uhlu lokudluliselwa kwakho yesigaba 2 . Kumngane ngamunye ongena ngesikhathi esifanayo nawe, uzothola u- 25 % owengeziwe kusilinganiso sakho samanje sokutholwa kokutholwa. [[:link]]Funda kabanzi[[/:link]]

active_users.title: Abasebenzisi abasebenzayo
active_users.description: Lesi isimo samanje somsebenzi wakho wokungena kwe-referral. Zibala njengezisebenzayo uma zineseshini yokungena esebenzayo.

tier_one_earnings.title: Izinzuzo zesigaba 1
tier_one_earnings.description: Lapha ungabona uhlu lokudluliselwa kwakho kwesigaba 1. Kumngane ngamunye ongena ngesikhathi esifanayo nawe, uzothola u-25% owengeziwe kusilinganiso sakho samanje sokutholwa kokutholwa.

ping.title: Inkinobho ye-Ping
ping.description: Yazisa abadluliseli bakho ukuze baqale izikhathi zabo zokungena. Ungathumela isaziso esisodwa kokudluliselwa ngakunye njalo ngo-24h.

home.title: Ikhaya
home.description: Siyakwamukela ku[[:ice]]. Esikrinini sasekhaya ungathola zonke izibalo ezimayelana nebhalansi yakho, izinga lamanje lomholo, izinga lakho lomhlaba kanye nethimba lakho.

invite.title: mema
invite.description: Kuwo wonke umuntu omumemayo, nobabili nizozuza kufika ku-25% ngesilinganiso senu sokuhola esiyisisekelo. Uma ubamema abantu abaningi, uzozuza kakhulu.

team.title: Ithimba
team.description: [[:ice]] ungcono nabangani Kuleli khasi ungabona isimo samalungu eqembu lakho kuwo womabili amazinga eSigaba 1 kanye nesigaba 2. Ungakwazi futhi ukuwafaka kusuka lapha.

news.title: Izindaba
news.description: Hlala unolwazi lwakamuva ngazo zonke izindaba zethu nezinhlolovo. Njengoba siyinhlangano Ezimele, uzokwazi ukuvota lapha ukuze uthole izici ezizayo.

profile.title: Iphrofayela
profile.description: Enza ngendlela oyifisayo imininingwane yephrofayela yakho futhi ubone zonke izimpumelelo zakho namabheji owazuzile. Sebenzisa isibali esisuka lapha, ukuze ukwazi ukulinganisa imali oyizuzayo.

earningicestart.title: Ukuthola iqhwa
earningicestart.description: Ungaqala isikhathi[[:ice]] sokungena njalo emahoreni angama-24 ngokuthepha le nkinobho. Ungakhohlwa ukubuya nsuku zonke futhi uqale ukuzuza!

earningiceseemore.title: Ukuthola iqhwa
earningiceseemore.description: Thepha futhi ubone imininingwane eyengeziwe mayelana neseshini yakho yamanje yokungena.

stats.title: Izibalo
stats.description: Ekhasini lezibalo ungabona abasebenzisi Bengqikithi Nabasebenzisi abangena usuku ngalunye kanye Namazwe Aphezulu nabasebenzisi.

help.title: Usizo
help.description: Ingabe unemibuzo? Bheka uhlu lwethu lwemibuzo evame ukubuzwa. Uma ungakutholi okufunayo, ungangabazi ukuxhumana nathi ku-hi@ice.io.

preStaking.title: I-Pre-Staking
preStaking.description: Khulisa izimbuyiselo zakho ngokufaka kusengaphambili imiklomelo oyizuzayo. Khetha isabelo sakho nesikhathi sokubamba ukuze uthole ibhonasi ngaphezu kwenzuzo yakho.

wallet.title: Ikhadi le-Wallet
wallet.description: Ungathola lapha[[:ice]] ibhalansi yakho yamanje, kanye nezinga lomholo. Uma ukudluliselwa okuvela eqenjini lakho ku-inthanethi, izinga lomholo liphezulu.

earning.title: Ikhadi Lokuthola Imali
earning.description: Hlala unolwazi lwakamuva ngezinga lakho lokuhola namabhonasi! Lapha ungabheka isilinganiso sakho samanje, isilinganiso sethu esiyisisekelo, namazinga ebhonasi emisebenzi ehlukahlukene kuhlelo lokusebenza.

engagement.title: UKUBAMBISANA
engagement.description: Landelela ukulandelana kwezikhathi zakho zokungena nezinsuku zokuphumula! Hlola lesi sigaba ukuze uthole imininingwane eyengeziwe mayelana nezikhathi zakho zokungena ezilandelanayo futhi ubone ukuthi zingaki izinsuku onazo zokuphumula.

profilecard.title: Ikhadi Lephrofayela
profilecard.description: Ungakwazi ukulandelela isimo sephrofayela yakho ngokulandela leli khadi. Ibonisa izinga lakho lamanje lomhlaba wonke, kanye nendima yakho, ileveli kanye nenani lokudluliselwa.

referralscard.title: Ikhadi Lokudluliswa
referralscard.description: Bona ukuvela kwezibalo zakho zokudlulisela ezinsukwini ezingu-5 zangaphambilini kokubili kokudluliselwa kweSigaba 1 kanye neSigaba 2 ngokuthepha leli khadi.

adoptioncard.title: Ikhadi Lokutholwa
adoptioncard.description: Ngokusekelwe esilinganisweni sesamba seviki eledlule sabakwa-Snowmen abasebenzayo, ungabona izinga[[:ice]] lamanje lomholo. Izinga lokuhola lincishiswa ngohhafu lapho lifinyelelwa emngceleni olandelayo.

nickname.title: Isiteketiso
nickname.description: Isiteketiso yisona esikwenza uhluke. Abangani bakho bazodinga ukusebenzisa lesi siteketiso ukuze bajoyine iqembu lakho. Ungasebenzisa lesi sinqamuleli ukuze uvule iphrofayela yakho.

balancehistory.title: Ibhalansi umlando
balancehistory.description: Ungathola lapha ibhalansi yakho yamanje[[:ice]] ku-wallet yendawo kanye ne-blockchain. Ibhalansi yendawo yesikhwama ibuyekezwa njalo ngehora, kuyilapho ibhalansi ye-blockchain ibuyekezwa njalo emahoreni angama-24.

achievements.title: Izimpumelelo
achievements.description: Qedela imisebenzi engezansi bese ukhuphuka ileveli! Iseshini yakho yokuqala yokungena.

unlinkLogin.title: Susa ukuxhumanisa Ukungena
unlinkLogin.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa ukuxhumanisa ukungena ngemvume{{providerName}} kusuka kule divayisi?

endSession.title: Qeda Iseshini
endSession.message: Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukumisa isikhathi{{providerName}} sokungena ngemvume kule divayisi?

extra_bonus.claim_message: Isikhathi sebhonasi yakho yanamuhla, sicela uchofoze inkinobho ethi[[:bold]] "Mangalela Ibhonasi"[[/:bold]] ngezansi.
extra_bonus.extra_message: Uthole ibhonasi yakho yansuku zonke eyengeziwe ngezinga lakho lomholo.
extra_bonus.expired_message: Ngeshwa, ibhonasi yanamuhla iphelelwe yisikhathi. Hlala ubukele ukuze uthole isaziso esilandelayo!

mining_notice.title: Isaziso
mining_notice.message: Siyabonga ngentshisekelo yakho yokuzuza[[:bold]] iqhwa![[/:bold]] Okwamanje silungisa ubuchwepheshe bethu futhi ukungena akutholakali okwamanje. Leli yithuba lakho lokugxila ekwakheni iqembu lakho nasekukhuliseni umphakathi wakho omncane.
mining_notice.message_footer: Hlala ubukele ukuze uthole izibuyekezo eziteshini zethu [[:twitter]]ze-Twitter[[/:twitter]] ne-[[:telegram]]Telegram[[/:telegram]].

qr_code.description: Skena ikhodi ye-QR ukuze ujoyine ithimba lami.

tiktok.title: Hlanganyela nathi ku-TikTok
tiktok.description: Besifuna nje ukufinyelela futhi sikwazise ngomphakathi wethu omusha othokozisayo ku-TikTok. Sabelana ngokuqukethwe okujabulisayo nokufundisayo mayelana nemali yethu yedijithali, iqhwa, futhi singathanda ukuthi usijoyine!

youtube.title: Sijoyine ku-YouTube
youtube.description: Kusukela ezifundweni zokuthi ungathola kanjani iqhwa, izibuyekezo mayelana nezici ezintsha, ngisho nokuqukethwe komphakathi okujabulisayo, isiteshi sethu se-YouTube siyindawo ekahle yokuhlala unolwazi lwakamuva.

linkedin.title: Hlanganyela nathi ku-LinkedIn
linkedin.description: Ukujoyina umphakathi weqhwa ku-LinkedIn kuyindlela enhle yokuhlala unolwazi mayelana nentuthuko yakamuva kanye nokuxhumana nabantu abanomqondo ofanayo nabanentshisekelo ngekusasa lezinhlobo zemali zedijithali njengawe.

facebook.title: Hlanganyela nathi kuFacebook
facebook.description_part1: Sincoma kakhulu ukunikeza ikhasi lethu le-Facebook ukulandela.
facebook.description_part2: Ngeke nje kukusize ukuthi uhlale unolwazi lwakamuva ngakho konke okwenzekayo ngephrojekthi yeqhwa, kodwa futhi kuyindlela enhle yokuxhumana nomphakathi wethu futhi ube yingxenye yengxoxo.

instagram.title: Hlanganyela nathi ku-Instagram
instagram.description_part1: Ukusilandela ku-Instagram kuyindlela enhle yokuhlala unolwazi futhi uxhumane nabanye abasebenzisi nabo abathanda iqhwa
instagram.description_part2: Futhi, uzoba ngowokuqala ukwazi mayelana nanoma yiziphi izici ezintsha noma amaphromoshini esiwaqalisayo.

ping_referrals_pop_up.title: Sicela ulinde ngisho uma sizuma bonke abangane bakho · {{count}}
